snippet.name: linkselector
snippet.starttext: <seform:linkselector id="$${id}" label="$${label}" required="$${required:no|yes}" arrange="$${arrange:horizontal|vertical}" rowid="$${rowid}" labelclass="$${labelclass}" labelstyle="$${labelstyle}" value="$${value}" fieldwidth="$${fieldwidth}" externallinks="$${externallinks:no|yes}" selectlist="$${selectlist}" visiblelist="$${visiblelist}" renderviewmode="$${renderviewmode}" note="$${note}" />
